Text: Anybody who knows how season 1 ends???? I have my doubt about having the complete season 1.

I can't write how the last episode ends here, but look at http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0455275/episodes#season-1 where 22 episodes are listed. These 22 episodes are included in this torrent. I definitely think it is such a "cliffhanger" by purpose.

Yes this contains all of the 22 episodes shown so far and with one srt-file (swedish subs) for each episode. Click on the link "44" after "Files:" above to see the complete list of all the files in this torrent.

For the video you need the xvid codec.

For the subtitles to work in VLC:
Start the video. Press stop. Go to Settings/Preferences/Video/Subtitles/Browse

Find the subtitle file, press save and and start the video and it should work.
